title: PBSHM Schema: base structure
description: a JSON schema for population-based structural health monitoring data

version.title: version number
version.description: the version of the schema that the document is compliant to

name.title: structure name
name.description: the unique structure name within the population

population.title: population name
population.description: the unique name of the population of structures

timestamp.title: UTC date
timestamp.description: the timestamp of when the data was recorded, stored in nanoseconds since UNIX epoch
